--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Havotron continued for thier home base, with a nasty look on his 
> face of hatred.
> 
> Scrapper looked at Hook, now passed out.  He went over and 
> picked him up, taking into the air behind Spinister.
> 
> Needlenose flew on the right of Spinister.

::LONG HAUL::

      The Decepticon Constructicon looked worriedly at Hook and 
Havotron, concerned with the welfare of his companion and the wrath of 
his leader. Things were NOT looking good. It was time to patch things 
up...
      "Great leader.." he said cautiously. "If I could do anything to 
simplify the situation....to err on the side of caution." He looked at 
his wounded companion, saddened. "I am concerned." he said, pointing 
to Hook, "For the welfare of my companion. How may I correct the 
situation between us?"
      He looked at his leader expectantly.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
